alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lewis; Marion; Monroe; Ralls; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 8:28PM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR KNOX...RALLS...MARION...SHELBY...LEWIS AND MONROE COUNTIES... At 827 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plevna, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hannibal, Palmyra, Monroe City, Canton, Shelbina, Paris, Edina, Santa Fe, Warren, La Grange, Clarence, Perry, La Belle, Madison, Shelbyville, Lewistown, Center, Ewing, Rensselaer and Knox City. This also includes Wakonda State Park, Union Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Mark Twain Lake Recreational Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Knox; Lewis; Marion; Monroe; Ralls; Shelby
